name: Crimson Amber Medallion
effect: Effect Raises maximum HP by 6%
description: A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
how to acquire: The Crimson Amber Medallion can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1,500 Runes.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum HP by 7%
description: A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
how to acquire: The Crimson Amber Medallion +1 can be found in Volcano Manor. Go to the Prison Town Church Site of Grace, go out and through the little town as if you were progressing through the manor as normal, and use a Stonesword Key to go through the fog gate. An Abductor Virgin is there, but you can easily run up the stairs to the level above, where the talisman is on a dead body.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +2 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum HP by 8%
description: A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
how to acquire: The Crimson Amber Medallion +2 Can be found just southwest of the Leyndell, Ashen Capital Site of Grace, by dropping down the open sewer grate to the beam below.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +3 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum HP by 10%
description: A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
how to acquire: The Crimson Amber Medallion +3 can be obtained as a reward upon defeating the Death Knight boss located at the Fog Rift Catacombs.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
effect: Effect Raises maximum FP by 7%
description: A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid. Boosts maximum FP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum FP by 9%
description: A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid. Boosts maximum FP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +2 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum FP by 11%
description: A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid.Boosts maximum FP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

effect: Effect Raises maximum FP by 12.5%
description: A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid.Boosts maximum FP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion
effect: Effect Raises maximum Stamina by 11%
description: A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum Stamina by 13%
description: A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +2 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum Stamina by 15%
description: A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +3 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum Stamina by 17%
description: A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

name: Two-Headed Turtle Talisman
effect: Effect Greatly raises stamina recovery speed by 22.5%
description: A talisman in the shape of a two-headed green turtle. Greatly raises stamina recovery speed. Turtles are known as a nutritious ingredient, symbolic of inexhaustible power. Two-headed turtles are a favorite subject in the land of the tower, due to the spiral shape of their intertwined necks.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm
effect: Effect Raises Robustness by 90
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises robustness. (Robustness governs resistance to blood loss and frost.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises Robustness by 140
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises robustness. (Robustness governs resistance to blood loss and frost.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm +2 Variant
effect: Effect Raises Robustness by 180
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises robustness. (Robustness governs resistance to blood loss and frost.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Immunizing Horn Charm
effect: Effect Raises Immunity by 90
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers.Raises immunity.(Immunity governs resistance to poison and rot.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers , over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Immunizing Horn Charm +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises Immunity by 140
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers.Raises immunity.(Immunity governs resistance to poison and rot.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers , over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers.Raises immunity.(Immunity governs resistance to poison and rot.) Said to be a budding horn. name: Clarifying Horn Charm
effect: Effect Raises Focus by 140
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers.Raises focus.(Focus governs resistance to sleep and madness.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

effect: Effect Raises Focus by 180
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers.Raises focus.(Focus governs resistance to sleep and madness.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

effect: Effect Raises Focus by 230
description: An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers.Raises focus.(Focus governs resistance to sleep and madness.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Mottled Necklace
effect: Effect Raises Immunity, Robustness, and Focus by 40
description: A vividly-colored accoutrement precious to the ancestral followers. Raises immunity, robustness, and focus. Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Mottled Necklace +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises Immunity, Robustness, and Focus by 60
description: A vividly-colored accoutrement precious to the ancestral followers. Raises immunity, robustness, and focus. Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Mottled Necklace +2 Variant
effect: Effect Raises Immunity, Robustness, and Focus by 100
description: A vividly-colored accoutrement precious to the ancestral followers. Raises immunity, robustness, and focus. Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believed that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.

name: Spelldrake Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Magic Damage taken by 13%
description: Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. Boosts magic damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Spelldrake Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Magic Damage taken by 17%
description: Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. Boosts magic damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Spelldrake Talisman +2 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Magic Damage taken by 20%
description: Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. Boosts magic damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

effect: Effect Reduces Magic Damage taken by 22%
description: Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. Boosts magic damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Flamedrake Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Fire Damage taken by 13%
description: Talisman depicting a red ancient dragon. Boosts fire damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

effect: Effect Reduces Fire Damage taken by 17%

effect: Effect Reduces Fire Damage taken by 20%
description: Talisman depicting a red ancient dragon. Boosts fire damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

effect: Effect Reduces Fire Damage taken by 22%
description: Talisman depicting a red ancient dragon. Boosts fire damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Boltdrake Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Lightning Damage taken by 13%
description: Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled before the prehistoric era of the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Boltdrake Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Lightning Damage taken by 17%
description: Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled before the prehistoric era of the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

effect: Effect Reduces Lightning Damage taken by 20%
description: Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled before the prehistoric era of the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Boltdrake Talisman +3 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Lightning Damage taken by 22%
description: Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled before the prehistoric era of the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Golden Braid
effect: Effect Boosts holy damage negation by 22%
description: A braid of golden hair, cut loose. Queen Marika's offering to the Grandmother. Boosts holy damage negation by the utmost. What was her prayer? Her wish, her confession? There is no one left to answer, and Marika never returned home again.

name: Pearldrake Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Elemental Damage taken by 5%
description: Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon. Boosts non-physical damage negation. The ancient dragons who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Elemental Damage taken by 7%
description: Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon. Boosts non-physical damage negation. The ancient dragons who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +2 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Elemental Damage taken by 9%
description: Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon. Boosts non-physical damage negation. The ancient dragons who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +3 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Elemental Damage taken by 11%
description: Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon.Boosts non-physical damage negation. The ancient dragons who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Crimson Seed Talisman
effect: Effect Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears by 20%
description: A crimson-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears. The Erdtree was once perfect and eternal, and thus was it believed that Erdtree seeds could not exist.

name: Crimson Seed Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears by 30%
description: A crimson-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears. The Erdtree was once perfect and eternal, and thus was it believed that Erdtree seeds could not exist.

name: Cerulean Seed Talisman
effect: Effect Boosts FP restoration from Flask of Cerulean Tears by 20%
description: A cerulean-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed.Boosts FP restoration from the Flask of Cerulean Tears. The Erdtree was once perfect and eternal, and thus was it believed that Erdtree seeds could not exist.

name: Cerulean Seed Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Boosts FP restoration from Flask of Cerulean Tears by 30%
description: A cerulean-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed.Boosts FP restoration from the Flask of Cerulean Tears. The Erdtree was once perfect and eternal, and thus was it believed that Erdtree seeds could not exist.

name: Blessed Blue Dew Talisman
effect: Effect Slowly restores FP
description: Talisman depicting the blessed boon that is a droplet of the blue, luminescent sap of the Erdtree. Gradually restores FP. It was once thought that the blessed sap of the Erdtree would drip from its boughs forever—but that age of plenty swiftly came to a close, and with time, the Erdtree became more an object of faith.

name: Fine Crucible Feather Talisman
effect: Effect Improves backsteps but increases damage taken
description: A talisman fashioned from thin feathers that embody the aspects of various creatures. Said to have grown on the human body long ago. Improves backsteps but increases damage taken at all times. Hornsent view the Crucible as sacred for the refinement wrought through its evolutionary gifts. Most prominently, their tangled horns.

name: Outer God Heirloom
effect: Effect Raises arcane by 5
description: A talisman engraved with the lore of an outer god. Raises arcane. The clan, who lost everything in the great fires, peered upon the corpse of their ancestor, normally an act of sanctity, and saw in its shadow a twisted deity. The clan had suffered such torment that the horrible thing was taken as an object of worship.

name: Shattered Stone Talisman
effect: Effect Raises potency of kicking and stomping skills
description: Shattered linchpin stone. Raises potency of kicking and stomping skills. Linchpin stones are spiritual anchors said to hold the ground in place and quell the fury of earthquakes—when this one shattered, the surrounding town fell into the broken earth. One account claimed that the moon itself had come tumbling down.

name: Two-Handed Sword Talisman
effect: Effect Enhances attacks with two-handed weapons by 15%
description: A talisman depicting a warrior two-handing a sword. Enhances attacks with two-handed weapons. The horned warriors were fitting figureheads for the military might of the tower they kept watch over, their deft attacks slashing through any and all foes.

name: Crusade Insignia
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 15% for 20 seconds after defeating an enemy
description: A talisman depicting a raised spear on a backdrop of flames, in remembrance of the lives lost in the sacred crusade led by Messmer. Raises attack power after defeating an enemy. The warriors who fought in the crusade set aside both honor and mercy to wantonly impale and scorch those deemed impure. Those who felt invigorated by each cry of death were the same men who were certain of the sanctity of the campaign.

name: Aged One's Exultation
effect: Effect Madness in the vicinity increases attack power by 20%
description: A talisman depicting the exultation of the aging untouchable, whose head resembles a sprig of ripe grapes. Raises attack power when madness is triggered in the vicinity. "Gift your madness to our Lord. Bless our brethren with grapes. Take care that they fully ripen."

name: Arrow's Soaring Sting Talisman
effect: Effect Increases the effective range of bows by 50% and raises attack power of arrows and bolts by 8%
description: A talisman composed of fletched and iron arrows. Increases the effective range of bows and raises attack power of arrows and bolts.

name: Pearl Shield Talisman
effect: Reduces Elemental Damage taken by 20% while guarding
description: Talisman depicting a knight bearing a pearlescent greatshield. Boosts all non-physical damage negation while guarding. The nature and the potential of impurity surpassed the understanding of the knights, and so they were forced to prepare for all threats known or unknown.

name: Dried Bouquet
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 20% for 30 seconds when summoned spirit dies
description: A quaint bouquet of dried flowers, offered to a small grave. Raises attack power when a spirit you have summoned dies. The sorrow that flows from the untimely demise of a loved one is a tenderness shared by all, regardless of birthplace.

name: Smithing Talisman
effect: Effect Enhances weapon-throwing attacks by 10%
description: A talisman depicting an ancient smithing hammer. Inscribed with a smithscript. Enhances weapon-throwing attacks. In ancient times, smithing was a divine act, and blacksmiths interpreted the script they perceived in the wrinkles of molten steel to imbue weapons with souls.

name: Ailment Talisman
effect: Effect Raises resistance to the last ailment suffered
description: A talisman depicting a soul taken by sickness. When certain ailments are triggered, this talisman grants resistance to the same ailment. When the weak were infected with the dreaded fly sickness, they perished well before the metamorphosis could take hold. Oddly, those who cared for the infected and made certain they were given a proper burial were never afflicted themselves.

name: Retaliatory Crossed-Tree
effect: Effect Enhances attacks executed after rolling or backstepping by 17%
description: Handicraft depicting a golden crossed-tree. One of the items conferred to the Needle Knights. Enhances attacks executed after rolling or backstepping. Long ago, the Needle Knights were in service of Miquella, but now they are no more. Save for one.

name: Lacerating Crossed-Tree
effect: Effect Enhances dash attacks
description: Handicraft depicting a golden crossed-tree. One of the items conferred to the Needle Knights. Enhances dash attacks. Long ago, the Needle Knights were in service of Miquella, but now they are no more. Save for one.

name: Sharpshot Talisman
effect: Effect Boosts attack power of precision-aimed shots by 12%
description: A talisman depicting an archer wielding a longbow. Boosts attack power of precision-aimed shots. The Albinauric archers were in a class of their own, and their deadly long-range specialists struck fear into the hearts of men.

name: St. Trina's Smile
effect: Effect Sleep in the vicinity increases attack power by 20%
description: A talisman depicting a smiling St. Trina, a vision conjured deep within a certain man's heart. Raises attack power when sleep is triggered in the vicinity. "Only I am allowed to know. Of your velvety sleep. Its sweetly gentle embrace. So please, smile—for me, and only me."

name: Talisman of the Dread
effect: Effect Raises potency of magma by 14%
description: Talisman depicting the dread dragon of the jagged peak, whose roars cause the peak's molten fury to boil and churn. Raises potency of magma. Bayle was the foul dragon's name—a terrible harbinger of destruction whose challenge to the ancient Dragonlord ended in grievous mutual injury.

name: Enraged Divine Beast
effect: Effect Raises potency of storms by 10%
description: A charm depicting the crazed, cavorting dance of the divine beast conducted at the tower festival. Raises potency of storms. Divine beasts are messengers of the heavens, and their rage mirrors the tumult of the skies, of which storms are the pinnacle.

name: Beloved Stardust
effect: Effect Shortens casting speed for sorcery and incantations by the utmost, but increases damage taken
description: A talisman depicting a wizened hand gently gripping a glintstone. Shortens casting speed for sorcery and incantations by the utmost, but increases damage taken. Count Ymir was known for his recitations. "One need only envision the romance of the stars above with adoration for stardust in one's heart to become a great sorcerer. Do so, and you will know love."

name: Talisman of Lord's Bestowal
effect: Effect Increases poise by 54% for 2 seconds after using a flask of tears
description: A talisman depicting Godfrey, first Elden lord, receiving the precious sap. Increases poise after using a flask of tears. The Lord accepted the sap stoically, without any sign of wavering. No wonder Lord of the Erdtree casts a long shadow over the lands.

name: Verdigris Discus
effect: Effect Raises defense 10% at heavy load or 20% when overloaded
description: A discus made of verdigris, the corroded metal known for its heft. Raises defense with higher equipment load. Great weight makes for great strength. The strength to protect others.

name: Rellana's Cameo
effect: Effect Enhances attacks by 45 executed after maintaining the same stance for 1 second
description: Talisman featuring a gallant portrait of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight. Enhances attacks executed after maintaining the same stance for a certain length of time. Engraved as a reminder of the unparalleled devotion of those who left their homelands to serve Rellana. "By your leave, we will accompany you wherever your lunar vessel takes you."

name: Blade of Mercy
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 20% for 20 seconds after each critical hit
description: A thin, blood-stained dagger. No longer fit for use. Raises attack power after each critical hit. Hornsent employed this to honorably end the suffering of a compatriot. After claiming numerous lives, the dagger is now broken, but has acquired a spectral aura.

name: Talisman of All Crucibles
effect: Effect Grants effects of all crucible talismans
description: A giant mass of intermingling Crucible attributes. Reduces damage taken from critical hits and head shots and improves the effectiveness of rolling and backstepping, but also increases damage taken at all times. Rumored to have sprouted upon giants and is known as the "mother of Crucibles" in ancient tower lore.

name: Blessed Dew Talisman
effect: Effect Restores 2 HP/sec
description: Talisman depicting a drop of the Erdtree's sap, a blessed boon. Gradually restores HP. It was once thought that the blessed sap of the Erdtree would drip from its boughs forever -- but that age of plenty swiftly came to a close, and with time, the Erdtree became more an object of faith.

name: Green Turtle Talisman
effect: Effect Raises Stamina recovery speed by 8 per second (17.7%)
description: A talisman in the shape of a green turtle.Raises stamina recovery speed. Turtles are known as a nutritious ingredient, symbolic of inexhaustible power. However, those who hold turtles to be wise creatures consider the practice of eating their meat to be barbarous.

name: Arsenal Charm
effect: Effect Raises maximum Equip Load by 15%
description: An iron charm that resembles a mass of weaponry. Boosts maximum equipment load. This talisman was derived from an unusual greatsword, once wielded by a hero hungry for vengeance.

name: Arsenal Charm +1 Variant
effect: Effect Raises maximum Equip Load by 17%
description: An iron charm that resembles a mass of weaponry. Boosts maximum equipment load. This talisman was derived from an unusual greatsword, once wielded by a hero hungry for vengeance.

name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
effect: Effect Vastly raises maximum Equip Load, by 19%
description: A charm that resembles a great jar overflowing with weaponry.Vastly boosts maximum equipment load. The great jar grants this talisman to their warriors. Carry as much as you can — grow big and strong.

name: Radagon's Scarseal
effect: Effect Raises Vigor, Endurance, Strength, and Dexterity by 3, but increases damage taken by 10%
description: An eye engraved with an Elden Rune.Said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon. Raises vigor, endurance, strength, and dexterity, but also increases damage taken. These seals represent the lifelong duty of those chosen by the gods.

name: Radagon's Soreseal
effect: Effect Raises Vigor, Endurance, Strength, and Dexterity by 5 each, but increases damage taken by 15%
description: This legendary talisman is an eye engraved with an Elden Rune, said to be the seal of King Consort Radagon. Greatly raises vigor, endurance, strength, dexterity, but also increases damage taken by a similar measure. Solemn duty weighs upon the one beholden; not unlike a gnawing curse from which there is no deliverance.

name: Marika's Scarseal
effect: Effect Raises Mind, Intelligence, Faith, and Arcane by 3, but increases damage taken by 10%
description: An eye engraved with an Elden Rune.Said to be the seal of Queen Marika. Raises mind, intelligence, faith, arcane, but also increases damage taken. These seals represent the lifelong duty of those chosen by the gods.

name: Marika's Soreseal
effect: Effect Raises Mind, Intelligence, Faith, and Arcane by 5 each, but increases damage taken by 15%
description: This legendary talisman is an eye engraved with an Elden Rune, said to be the seal of Queen Marika. Greatly raises mind, intelligence, faith, and arcane, but also increases damage taken by a similar measure. Solemn duty weighs upon the one beholden; not unlike a gnawing curse from which there is no deliverance.

name: Starscourge Heirloom
effect: Effect Raises Strength by 5
description: A talisman engraved with a scene from a heroic tale.Raises strength. The mightiest hero of the demigods confronted the falling stars alone—and thus did he crush them, his conquest sealing the very fate of the stars.

name: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom
effect: Effect Raises Dexterity by 5
description: A talisman engraved with a scene from a heroic tale.Raises dexterity. Though born into the accursed rot, when the young girl encountered her mentor and his flowing blade, she gained wings of unparalleled strength.

name: Stargazer Heirloom
effect: Effect Raises Intelligence by 5
description: A talisman engraved with the legend of a queen.Raises intelligence. The young astrologer gazed at the night sky as she walked. She had always chased the stars every step of her journey. Then she met the full moon — and, in time, the astrologer became a queen.

name: Two Fingers Heirloom
effect: Effect Raises Faith by 5
description: A talisman engraved with the legend of the Two Fingers.Raises faith. Fingers cannot speak, yet these are eloquent.Persistently they wriggle, spelling out mysteries in the air.Thus did we gain the words. The words of our faith.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Physical Damage taken 10%
description: Wrought iron talisman depicting a trio of ancient dragons.Boosts physical damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Physical Damage taken 13%
description: Wrought iron talisman depicting a trio of ancient dragons.Boosts physical damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Physical Damage taken 17%
description: Wrought iron talisman depicting a trio of ancient dragons.Boosts physical damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
effect: Effect Enormously reduces Physical Damage taken by 20%.
description: Legendary talisman of wrought iron depicting a massive ancient dragon.Enormously boosts physical damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Haligdrake Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Holy Damage taken by 13%
description: Talisman depicting a golden ancient dragon.Boosts holy damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Haligdrake Talisman +1 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Holy Damage taken by 17%
description: Talisman depicting a golden ancient dragon.Boosts holy damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Haligdrake Talisman +2 Variant
effect: Effect Reduces Holy Damage taken by 20%
description: Talisman depicting a golden ancient dragon.Boosts holy damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock.And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.

name: Prince of Death's Pustule
effect: Effect Raises Vitality by 90
description: A fetid pustule taken from facial flesh.Raises vitality.(Vitality governs resistance to the effects of Death.) It is said that this pustule came from the visage of the Prince of Death, he who used to be called Godwyn. As First Dead of the demigods, it's said he's buried deep under the capital, at the Erdtree's roots.

name: Prince of Death's Cyst
effect: Effect Greatly raises Vitality, by 140
description: A fetid, overgrown cyst taken from facial flesh.Greatly raises vitality.(Vitality governs resistance to the effects of Death.) It is said that this cyst came from the corrupted visage of one unable to die a true Death. Indeed, it comes from the Prince of Death, scion of the golden bough and First of the Dead among the demigods.

name: Dagger Talisman
effect: Effect Increases Critical Damage by 17%
description: A talisman depicting a dagger and a surgeon.Enhances critical hits. The white-garbed field surgeons come to the aid of friend and foe alike by dealing a final deadly thrust to spare them from the prolonged agony of a mortal wound. A sense of mercy is a catalyst for bloodlust.

name: Curved Sword Talisman
effect: Effect Increases guard counter damage by 20%
description: A talisman depicting a curved sword and a swordsman.Enhances guard counters. It is said that a blind swordsman was the originator of this technique — the art of allowing one's opponent to strike so as to leave them vulnerable to a well-timed reply.

name: Twinblade Talisman
effect: Effect Increases damage of final hit in attack chain by 45%
description: A talisman depicting a twinblade and a confessor.Enhances the final hit ending a chain of attacks. The twinblade technique is a tradition of the confessors, who closely guard the secret of how they preserve the momentum of their attacks. Thus is the final strike of their onslaught all the more deadly.

name: Axe Talisman
effect: Effect Increases Charge Attack damage by 10%
description: A talisman depicting an axe and a warrior.Enhances charge attacks. The Lord who led the Long March bore an axe, and his loyal warriors honored him by wielding axes of their own, making them very effective at dealing decisive blows.

name: Hammer Talisman
effect: Effect Increases Stamina damage against blocking enemies by 40%
description: A talisman depicting a hammer and a knight.Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against a blocking opponent. Hammers are highly effective against shield-bearing foes, so much so that they are known as "knight-killers."

name: Spear Talisman
effect: Effect Increases thrusting weapon counterattack damage by 15%
description: A talisman depicting a spear and a soldier. Enhances the counterattacks that are unique to thrusting weapons. Spears are standard weapons for soldiers in the Lands Between. They made it possible to respond to a ferocious foe with an equally ferocious counterattack.

name: Lance Talisman
effect: Effect Increases damage of attacks while on horseback by 15%
description: A talisman depicting a lance and a knight.Enhances attacks while on horseback. Knights on horseback are deadly foes. They see all below from their lofty position, meeting little meaningful resistance as they charge ahead.

name: Claw Talisman
effect: Effect Increases jump attack damage by 15% (7.5% in PvP)
description: A talisman depicting a claw and an assassin.Enhances jump attacks. The assassins of Ravenmount are killers by trade. They assail their victims while dressed as birds of prey.

name: Greatshield Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces stamina damage taken while blocking by 20%
description: Talisman depicting a knight holding a greatshield.Boosts guarding ability. The knights of Leyndell once modelled themselves after the Tree Sentinels. Their purpose is to protect that which deserves protection, and thus the shield always comes before the sword.

name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
effect: Effect Raises attack power of Arrows/Bolts by 10%
description: A talisman depicting three iron arrows.Carried by soldiers long ago. Raises attack power of arrows and bolts.

name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
effect: Effect Increases range of various projectiles
description: A talisman depicting three arrows.Carried by hunters of beasts. Increases the effective range of bows.

name: Graven-School Talisman
effect: Effect Raises potency of Sorceries by 4%
description: A talisman depicting a school of graven mages, the nightmare of the academy. Raises potency of sorceries. The primeval current is a forbidden tradition of glintstone sorcery. To those who cleave to its teachings, the act of collecting sorcerers to fashion them into the seeds of stars is but another path of scientific inquiry.

name: Graven-Mass Talisman
effect: Effect Greatly raises potency of Sorceries by 8%
description: A talisman depicting the first school of graven mages — a nightmare that would continue to haunt the academy. Greatly raises potency of sorceries. The primeval current is a forbidden tradition of glintstone sorcery. To those who cleave to its teachings, the act of collecting sorcerers to fashion them into the seeds of stars is but another path of scientific inquiry.

name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
effect: Effect Raises potency of Incantations by 4%
description: A talisman bearing an icon that depicts a group of masked figures.Raises potency of incantations. The figures represent the flock at prayer, their firm belief in the intangible inspiring even the solitary founder of their religion. What is faith if not an affirmation?

name: Flock's Canvas Talisman
effect: Effect Greatly raises potency of incantations (8%)
description: A talisman bearing an icon that depicts a mass of masked figures.Greatly raises potency of incantations. The figures represent the flock at prayer, their firm belief in the intangible inspiring even the solitary founder of their religion. What is faith if not an affirmation?

name: Primal Glintstone Blade
effect: Effect Reduces Spell FP costs by 25% but reduces maximum HP by 15%
description: An old glintstone blade that has been stained with blood. Reduces FP consumption of sorceries and incantations at the cost of maximum HP. The old sorcerers would slice open their hearts with these blades to imbue a primal glintstone with their soul, and thus did they die.

name: Moon of Nokstella
effect: Effect Increases Memory Slots by 2
description: This legendary talisman is a treasure of Nokstella, the Eternal City. Increases memory slots. This talisman represents the lost black moon.The moon of Nokstella was the guide of countless stars.

name: Old Lord's Talisman
effect: Effect Extends the duration of Spells by 30%
description: A legendary talisman depicting the ancient king whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time. Extends the duration of sorceries and incantations. It is said that the ancient royal city of Farum Azula has been slowly crumbling since time immemorial.

name: Radagon Icon
effect: Effect Shortens the casting time of Spells
description: A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Radagon.Shortens the casting time of sorceries and incantations. As the husband of Rennala of Caria, the red-haired Radagon studied sorcery, and as the husband of Queen Marika, he studied incantations. Thus did the hero aspire to be complete.

name: Roar Medallion
effect: Effect Increases the damage of roars and breath attacks by 15%
description: A bronze medallion depicting a roaring giant.Enhances roars and breath attacks. In ancient times, the giants were mortal enemies of the Erdtree. Their bellowing roars desolated nature, triggered avalanches, and whipped up storms of flame.

name: Companion Jar
effect: Effect Raises potency of Throwing Pots by 20%
description: A talisman given by the jars to their friends.Raises potency of thrown jars. Though the jars are brought to life by human flesh and blood, they are all rather kindly folk. Perhaps they were made to be better than their innards.

name: Perfumer's Talisman
effect: Effect Raises potency of Arts employing Perfume by 20%
description: A talisman depicting a set of perfume bottles.Raises potency of arts employing perfume. There are gardens known only to the perfumers. Whether hidden on the fringes of the highlands, or obscured by shadows inside caves, the flowers blossom in secret, waiting to impart their scent.

name: Carian Filigreed Crest
effect: Effect Lowers FP cost of Skills by 25%
description: A talisman adorned with the royal crest. Lowers FP consumed by skills. An honor said to have once been awarded to Carian knights who served as direct retainers to the kingdom's princesses. Now there is only one princess: Ranni, daughter of Rennala.

name: Warrior Jar Shard
effect: Effect Boosts the attack power of Skills by 10%
description: Shard of a shattered warrior jar. Boosts the attack power of skills. Scraps of stewed flesh cling to the shard, and tatters of ornaments can be seen mingled within the slime. Relics of ancient royal warriors, perhaps.

name: Shard of Alexander
effect: Effect Greatly boosts the attack power of Skills by 15%
description: Shard of the late Alexander, a shattered warrior jar. Greatly boosts the attack power of skills. Scraps of stewed flesh cling to the shard, and tatters of ornaments can be seen mingled within the slime. Relics of a red-haired champion, it would seem.

name: Godfrey Icon
effect: Effect Raises attack power of charged Spells and Skills by 15%
description: A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Godfrey.Raises charge attack power of sorceries, incantations, and skills. Godfrey was a ferocious warrior. When he vowed to become a lord, he took the Beast Regent Serosh upon on his back to suppress the ceaseless lust for battle that raged within.

name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
effect: Effect Raises Poise by 33%
description: A talisman depicting the horns of a bull-goat.Raises poise. Bull-goats are associated with the stout and mighty Tragoth, said to be unflinching in combat - now a silent comrade to those who fight.

name: Blue Dancer Charm
effect: Effect Raises Physical Damage with lower Equip Weight
description: A cloth doll depicting a dancer garbed in blue.An ancient heirloom of some sort. Raises attack power with lower equipment load. The dancer in blue represents a fairy, who in legend bestowed a flowing sword upon a blind swordsman. Blade in hand, theswordsman sealed away an ancient god — a god that was Rot itself.

name: Magic Scorpion Charm
effect: Effect Increases Magic Damage by 12%, but increases Physical Damage taken by 10%
description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen.Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that shimmers with magic. Raises magic attack power, but lowers damage negation.

name: Fire Scorpion Charm
effect: Effect Increases Fire Damage by 12%, but increases Physical Damage taken by 10%
description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen.Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that burns with fire. Raises fire attack power, but lowers damage negation.

name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
effect: Effect Increases Lightning Damage by 12%, but increases Physical Damage taken by 10%
description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen.Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that sparks with lightning. Raises lightning attack power, but lowers damage negation.

name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
effect: Effect Increases Holy Damage by 12%, but increases Physical Damage taken by 10%
description: A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen.Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart with a blessed glow. Raises holy attack power, but lowers damage negation.

name: Crucible Scale Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces Critical Damage taken by 30%
description: A talisman fashioned from a scale that embodies the aspects of various creatures.Said to have grown on the human body long ago. Reduces damage taken from critical hits. A vestige of the crucible of primordial life. Born partially of devolution, it was considered a signifier of the divine in ancient times, but is now increasingly disdained as an impurity as civilization has advanced.

name: Crucible Feather Talisman
effect: Effect Improves dodge rolling but increases damage taken
description: A talisman fashioned from feathers that embody the aspects of various creatures.Said to have grown on the human body long ago. Improves the effectiveness of dodge rolls, but increases damage taken at all times. A vestige of the crucible of primordial life. Born partially of devolution, it was considered a signifier of the divine in ancient times, but is now increasingly disdained as an impurity as civilization has advanced.

name: Crucible Knot Talisman
effect: Effect Eliminates headshot bonus damage and stagger on self
description: A talisman fashioned from a bony knot that embodies that aspects of various creatures.Said to have grown on the human body long ago. Reduces damage and impact of headshots taken. A vestige of the crucible of primordial life. Born partially of devolution,it was considered a signifier of the divine in ancient times, but is now increasingly disdained as an impurity as civilization has advanced.

name: Red-Feathered Branchsword
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 20% when HP is below 20%
description: A talisman adorned with red feathers, once used in ancient death rituals.Raises attack power when HP is low. The heart sings when one draws close to death, and a glorious end awaits those who cling so tenaciously to life.

name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
effect: Effect Reduces damage taken by 50% when HP is below 20%
description: A talisman adorned with blue feathers, once used in ancient death rituals.Raises defense when HP is low. The heart sings when one draws close to death, and thus does one cling so tenaciously to life - to render up a death worth offering.

name: Ritual Sword Talisman
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 10% when HP is at maximum
description: A talisman patterned after swords used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree. Raises attack power when HP is at maximum. The practice had died out by the age of King Consort Radagon, but remains of the arenas where ritual combat took place can still be found in every land.

name: Ritual Shield Talisman
effect: Effect Reduces damage taken by 30% when HP is at maximum
description: A talisman patterned after shields used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree. Raises defense when HP is at maximum. The practice had died out by the age of King Consort Radagon, but remains of the arenas where ritual combat took place can still be found in every land.

name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
effect: Effect Critical attacks restore 10% + 85 HP
description: An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in crimson.Critical hits restore HP. This charm is modelled after the darkly gleaming blades used in the Night of Black Knives. Those which gave the demigods their first taste of death.

name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
effect: Effect Critical attacks restore 15 FP
description: An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in cerulean.Critical hits restore FP. This charm is modelled after the darkly gleaming blades used in the Night of Black Knives. Those which gave the demigods their first taste of death.

name: Winged Sword Insignia
effect: Effect Raises attack power with successive attacks (3%,5%,10%)
description: A talisman depicting a raised prosthetic blade.An honor bestowed upon the knights who fought alongside Malenia the Severed. Raises attack power with successive attacks. The wings symbolize Malenia and her undefeated prowess. Though she never knew relief from the accursed rot she was born into, her blade was forever beautiful - and relentless.

name: Rotten Winged Sword Insignia
effect: Effect Greatly raises attack power with successive attacks (6%,8%,13%)
description: A talisman depicting a raised prosthetic blade. An honor bestowed upon the valkyries who serve the goddess of rot. Greatly raises attack power with successive attacks. The Four sisters were born in the swamp of Aeonia, and came to the Haligtree under the aegis of Gowry. And yet, those buds were doomed to never blossom.

name: Millicent's Prosthesis
effect: Effect Boosts dexterity (+5), raises attack power with successive attacks (4%,6%, 11%)
description: Part of the golden prosthesis used by Millicent.The hand is locked into a fist that once raised a sword aloft. Boosts dexterity and raises attack power with successive attacks. The despair of sweet betrayal transformed Millicent from a mere bud into a magnificent flower. And one day, she will be reborn - as a beautiful scarlet valkyrie.

name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
effect: Effect Successive attacks restore 30 + 3% HP
description: Sacred cloth of the Godskin Apostles, made from supple skin sewn together. Successive attacks restore HP. The Gloam-Eyed Queen cradles newborn apostles swaddled in this cloth. Soon they will grow to become the death of the gods.

name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 20% for 20 seconds when Poisoning or Rot occurs in the vicinity
description: A talisman depicting the exultation of pests. Raises attack power when poisoning or rot occurs in the vicinity. "Rot for the scarlet goddess. O scarlet blossoms, flourish in distant lands, and return to us, the unwanted children."

name: Lord of Blood's Exultation
effect: Effect Raises attack power by 20% (12% in PvP) for 20 seconds when Blood Loss occurs in the vicinity
description: A talisman depicting the exultation of the Lord of Blood. Raises attack power when blood loss occurs in the vicinity. "Render up you offerings of blood to your Lord. Drench my consort's chamber. Slake his cocoon's thirst. His awakening shall herald the dawn of our dynasty"

name: Taker's Cameo
effect: Effect Restores 3% + 30 HP upon defeating enemies
description: A talisman engraved with a stern likeness of Praetor Rykard, master of Volcano Manor. Restores HP upon defeating enemies. When Rykard turned to heresy, taking by force became the rule. The gods themselves were no different, after all.

name: Ancestral Spirit's Horn
effect: Effect Restores 3 FP upon defeating enemies
description: Item cut from the horns of the Regal Ancestor Spirit. Restore FP upon defeating enemies. A number of new growths bud from the antler-like horns of the fallen king, each glowing with light. Thus does new life grow from death, and from death, one obtains power.

name: Gold Scarab
effect: Effect Increases Rune acquisition by 20%
description: A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things. This golden scarab increases the amount of runes obtained from defeating enemies.

name: Silver Scarab
effect: Effect Raises Item Discovery by 75
description: A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things. This silver scarab enhances item discovery.

name: Crepus's Vial
effect: Effect Eliminates all sound made by the wearer during movement
description: Small mysterious bottle with a dark mist sealed within. Eliminates all sound made by the wearer during movement. A ritual implement used by Roundtable Hold assassins. There was a time when Tarnished who had strayed from guidance feared nothing more than utter silence.

name: Concealing Veil
effect: Effect Conceals wearer while crouching away from foes
description: Talisman put together from dark cloth with a lustrous sheen. Completely conceals the wearer's presence while crouching at a distance from foes. Part of one of the concealing veils used by the assassins on the Night of Black Knives.

name: Longtail Cat Talisman
effect: Effect Negates non-lethal Fall Damage
description: A brooch depicting Lacrima, the long-tailed cat. Renders the wearer immune to fall damage.However, it cannot prevent falling to one's death. Lacrima features in the fables of Raya Lucaria, in which she is described as a faerie cat who was fond of playing in the great bell tower.

name: Furled Finger's Trick-Mirror
effect: Effect Take on appearance of a Host of Fingers
description: A small, clouded mirror that reflects a flesh-and-blood figure. Makes the bearer take on the appearance of a Host of Fingers One of the ritual implements created by the Tarnished to deceive invaders.

name: Host's Trick-Mirror
effect: Effect Take on appearance of a cooperator
description: A small, clouded mirror that reflects a flesh-and-blood figure. Makes the bearer take on the appearance of a summoned cooperator. One of the ritual implements created by the Tarnished to deceive invaders.

name: Shabriri's Woe
effect: Effect Constantly attracts enemies' aggression
description: Disturbing likeness of a man whose eyes have been gouged out.The corners of his mouth are upturned in an almost flirtatious manner. Constantly attracts enemies' aggression. It is said that the man, named Shabriri, had his eyes gouged out as punishment for the crime of slander, and, with time, the blight of the flame of frenzy came to dwell in the empty sockets.

name: Daedicar's Woe
effect: Effect Doubles damage taken
description: Disturbing likeness of a woman whose skin was flayed.She smiles with a serene tenderness. Increases damage taken. It is said that this woman, named Daedicar, indulged in every form of adultery and wicked pleasure imaginable, giving birth to a myriad of grotesque children.

name: Sacrificial Twig
effect: Effect Will be lost on death in place of runes.
description: A talisman fashioned from a dried twig, so slender that it might snap at the slightest touch. Prevent rune loss upon death, but will be lost itself in exchange. Believed to be a twig pruned from the Erdtree long, long ago.

name: Entwining Umbilical Cord
effect: Effect Changes demeanour of wearer's actions
description: Mysterious circular object that's oddly warped.Changes the demeanour of the wearer's actions.

name: Erdtree's Favor
effect: Increases HP (3%), Stamina (7%), and Equip Load (5%)
description: A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtree.Slightly raises maximum HP, stamina, and equip load. It is said that when the Age of the Erdtree began, such blessings were personally bestowed upon their recipients by Queen Marika herself.

name: Erdtree's Favor +1 Variant
effect: Increases HP (3.5%), Stamina (8.5%), and Equip Load (6.5%)
description: A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtree.Slightly raises maximum HP, stamina, and equip load. It is said that when the Age of the Erdtree began, such blessings were personally bestowed upon their recipients by Queen Marika herself.

name: Erdtree's Favor +2 Variant
effect: Increases HP (4%), Stamina (10%), and Equip Load (8.0%)
description: A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtree.Slightly raises maximum HP, stamina, and equip load. It is said that when the Age of the Erdtree began, such blessings were personally bestowed upon their recipients by Queen Marika herself.
